page.title: 14Uyeasound Sheltered Houses.
page.content: Ten of the houses at Brucehall Terrace are Sheltered Houses with 13 people living in them.The houses were built in 1977.They have a bedroom,a kitchen, a bathroom,a living room and a store room and an attic. The people who live there think they are easier and cheaper to keep clean and warm.Most of them like living there.However two of them don't like living there because there is a poor view.They all like the neighbours. The houses have a warden who lives in Brucehall Terrace.Her job consists of calling the Doctor when necessary or contacting Lerwick for repairs to the house.There is an alarm system for the old people to use.The warden also calls socially to keep in touch and help with minor house jobs such as changing light bulbs or fuses.Some of the residents have a Home Help.
